name: Jacobs Engineering Group Inc.
description: Jacobs Engineering Group Inc. is a global provider of professional services in engineering, architecture, construction, and management. Founded in 1947, Jacobs has established itself as a leader in delivering sustainable solutions across various sectors, including infrastructure, environmental, and energy. The company operates in more than 40 countries, serving a diverse range of clients from public institutions to private enterprises. Jacobs is committed to innovation and sustainability, leveraging advanced technologies and data-driven insights to address complex challenges. Their services encompass a wide array of areas, including project management, engineering design, construction management, and environmental consulting. With a mission to create a more connected, sustainable world, Jacobs focuses on improving the quality of life for communities and enhancing the efficiency of infrastructure systems. The firm has received numerous accolades for its commitment to sustainability and excellence in project delivery, positioning itself as a trusted partner in transforming ideas into reality.

seo.meta_title: Jacobs Engineering Group | Engineering and Construction Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Jacobs Engineering Group, a leader in professional services for engineering, architecture, and construction. Discover their commitment to sustainability and innovation.

faq.question: What does Jacobs Engineering do?
faq.answer: Jacobs Engineering provides engineering, architecture, construction, and management services globally.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Jacobs Engineering?
faq.answer: Steve Demetriou is the CEO of Jacobs Engineering Group Inc.

faq.question: Where is Jacobs headquartered?
faq.answer: Jacobs is headquartered in Dallas, Texas, USA.

faq.question: What are Jacobs' main services?
faq.answer: Jacobs offers services in engineering design, construction management, and environmental consulting.
